org.apache.ambari.server.checks

Class ClusterCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.checks.ClusterCheck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.ambari.spi.upgrade.UpgradeCheck
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmbariMetricsHadoopSinkVersionCompatibilityCheck, AutoStartDisabledCheck, ComponentsExistInRepoCheck, ComponentsInstallationCheck, ConfigurationMergeCheck, HardcodedStackVersionPropertiesCheck, HealthCheck, HostMaintenanceModeCheck, HostsHeartbeatCheck, HostsMasterMaintenanceCheck, HostsRepositoryVersionCheck, InstallPackagesCheck, KerberosAdminPersistedCredentialCheck, LZOCheck, MissingOsInRepoVersionCheck, PluginChecksLoadedCheck, PreviousUpgradeCompleted, RequiredServicesInRepositoryCheck, ServiceCheckValidityCheck, ServicePresenceCheck, ServicesMaintenanceModeCheck, ServicesUpCheck, VersionMismatchCheck

    public abstract class ClusterCheck
extends Object
implements org.apache.ambari.spi.upgrade.UpgradeCheck
    A base implementation of UpgradeCheck which offers injected helpers and access to information about repositories and the cluster.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected String formatEntityList(LinkedHashSet<String> entities)
      Formats lists of given entities to human readable form: [entity1] -> {entity1} {noun} [entity1, entity2] -> {entity1} and {entity2} {noun}s [entity1, entity2, entity3] -> {entity1}, {entity2} and {entity3} {noun}s The noun for the entities is taken from check type, it may be cluster, service or host.

      • getApplicableServices

        public Set<String> getApplicableServices()
        Gets the set of services that this check is associated with. If the check is not associated with a particular service, then this should be an empty set.
        Specified by:
        getApplicableServices in interface org.apache.ambari.spi.upgrade.UpgradeCheck
        Returns:
        a set of services which will determine whether this check is applicable.

        protected String getProperty(org.apache.ambari.spi.upgrade.UpgradeCheckRequest request,
                             String configType,
                             String propertyName)
                      throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Gets a cluster configuration property if it exists, or null otherwise.
        Parameters:
        request - the request (not null).
        configType - the configuration type, such as hdfs-site (not null).
        propertyName - the name of the property (not null).
        Returns:
        the property value or null if not found.
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • formatEntityList

        protected String formatEntityList(LinkedHashSet<String> entities)
        Formats lists of given entities to human readable form: [entity1] -> {entity1} {noun} [entity1, entity2] -> {entity1} and {entity2} {noun}s [entity1, entity2, entity3] -> {entity1}, {entity2} and {entity3} {noun}s The noun for the entities is taken from check type, it may be cluster, service or host.
        Parameters:
        entities - list of entities to format
        Returns:
        formatted entity list
